Corporate Standard, the EN ISO 14064-1 nor EN 15804 have specific norms on the adequacy of
emission factors for specific uses within an inventory calculation. These issues are largely assessed
through professional judgment, which may include asking for external professional advice that
could help determine the applicability of any given emission factor to a specific calculation case.
